trans-unit.source: Represents a member that can be declared in any <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 선언 될 수 있는 멤버를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An EdmMember class is a base class for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmProperty>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.NavigationProperty>, and <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipEndMember>.
trans-unit.target: EdmMember 클래스는 기본 클래스에 대 한 <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmProperty>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.NavigationProperty>, 및 <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipEndMember>.</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipEndMember> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.NavigationProperty> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmProperty>

trans-unit.source: The EdmMember class represents a member that can be declared in any <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType>.
trans-unit.target: EdmMember 클래스 모든 <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType>.</xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType> 선언 될 수 있는 멤버를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about members, see [Structural Types (Metadata)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c0c54fe0-e0ba-4e1d-8572-dfd2fbf788fa).
trans-unit.target: 멤버에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [구조 형식 (메타 데이터)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c0c54fe0-e0ba-4e1d-8572-dfd2fbf788fa)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type on which this member is declared.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버가 선언 된 형식을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the type on which this member is declared.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"> </xref> 이 멤버가 선언 된 형식을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this member.
Returns the name of this member.
Gets the instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> class that contains both the type of the member and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> </xref> 멤버 및 해당 형식의 패싯이 모두 형식을 포함 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object that contains both the type of the member and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"> </xref> 멤버 및 해당 형식의 패싯이 모두 형식을 포함 하는 개체입니다.
